description: Delete a project transport plan segment driver.
permissions: User must be authorized for the related project transport plan segment (policy delegates to the associated project transport plan and project).
side_effects: Deletes a project transport plan segment driver.
validation_notes: The project transport plan segment driver ID argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if the segment driver is managed by a plan driver (unless deleted via a managing plan driver or owning segment cascade).
